attributes.action: Raise Statutory Sick Pay, £94.25 is not manageable.
attributes.additional_details: People with large family’s and homes to maintain and cars can not manage of £94.25 a week. £377 a month is not enough to feed your family and pay bills.
attributes.background: I would like the government to raise the statutory sick pay from £94.25 as this is not manageable for someone with a house, car and kids.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302277

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
